name: Sonic The Hedgehog: Frenzy
description: -SONIC FRENZY- Welcome to Sonic Frenzy, a game where you gotta go fast!Controls -Arrow keys or WSAD to navigate the menu, space to select area -While in-game, use left and right arrows or A and D to move and up arrow or W to jump -For more info, please visit the How To Play area in the main menuPlotDr. Eggman is stealing all the rings from every zone in the world! Help Sonic catch him and reclaim all the rings! But, who knows what kind of trouble could happen with so many rings in one place...Hope you enjoy this game! :D
